title: Virginia Living Museum
content:
Hello all,   
I need some help from the experts. Thank you! ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126074819im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/49354.jpg)
author: julia

comments.content:
Except to say that it seems rather [Cheltenham-ish](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126074819/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=cheltenham+bold), I am unable to find a close match.   
   
cheers,   
Dana
Looks ITC-ish to me. Since I chucked six feet of U&Lc's I have no reference anymore...
Looks a bit Les Usherwood-ish to me, but nothing's turned up.
